import React, {useState} from 'react' const ImageEditor = () => { const [bBoxes, setBBoxes] = useState([]) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({}) const handleSumbit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const newBBox = {formData} setBBoxes([...bBoxes], newBBox) setFormData({}) } const handleChange = (e) => { const updatedValue = {[e.target.id]: e.target.value} setFormData(formData => ({ ...formData, ...updatedValue })) } return (
Draw BBox
) } export default ImageEditor
